name: Idaho Smith: The looters of the penultimate, recently rediscovered pyramid
name_original: Idaho Smith: The looters of the penultimate, recently rediscovered pyramid
description: Idaho Smith: The looters of the penultimate, recently rediscovered pyramid is a first person puzzle game created by a group of students at Staffordshire University. Solve puzzles, search for clues and avoid traps as you make your way through the ancient Egyptian pyramid to claim the sacred idol. Can you make it through? Play now to find out!
